org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth

Class BluetoothLeReadProvider<T extends Data>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.Provider<T,S>
      • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.core.AndroidProvider<T,S>
        • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeProvider<VoidData,T>
          • org.cloudbus.foggatewaylib.bluetooth.BluetoothLeReadProvider<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of the output data

    public abstract class BluetoothLeReadProvider<T extends Data>
extends BluetoothLeProvider<VoidData,T>
    BluetoothLeProvider that reads from the given GATT server, service and characteristic when executed and calls readCharacteristic(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic) when the value is retrieved.
    Author:
    Riccardo Mancini

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      private class  BluetoothLeReadProvider.BluetoothReadProviderGattCallback
      Custom callback that calls onRead(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int) at BluetoothGattCallback.onCharacteristicRead(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int).

      BluetoothLeReadProvider(java.util.UUID service, java.util.UUID characteristic, java.lang.Class<T> outputType)
      Constructs a provider with the given parameters that listens to all possible devices.

      • readCharacteristic

        protected abstract T readCharacteristic(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt,
                                        android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic)
        Called when the characteristic value is read, provides the output to be published.
        Parameters:
        gatt - the GATT server in which the read occurred.
        characteristic - the read characteristic.
        See Also:
        BluetoothGattCharacteristic.getValue(), BluetoothGattCallback.onCharacteristicRead(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int)

      • onRead

        @CallSuper
protected void onRead(android.bluetooth.BluetoothGatt gatt,
                                 android.bluetooth.BluetoothGattCharacteristic characteristic,
                                 int status)
        Called when the characteristic value is read, gets the output to be published and publishes it, if the status is BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS.
        Parameters:
        gatt - the GATT server in which the read occurred.
        characteristic - the read characteristic.
        status - BluetoothGatt.GATT_SUCCESS if the read was successful, something else otherwise.
        See Also:
        BluetoothGattCallback.onCharacteristicRead(BluetoothGatt, BluetoothGattCharacteristic, int)

      • onAttach

        public void onAttach()
        When attached to a ExecutionManager, adds the callback to the BluetoothLeHandler.

      • onDetach

        public void onDetach()
